verses.verse: Then Joseph <WH3130> went <WH935> in and told <WH5046> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and said <WH559>, My father <WH1> and my brethren <WH251>, and their flocks <WH6629>, and their herds <WH1241>, and all that they have <WH935>, are come out of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>; and <WH776>, behold, they are in the land of Goshen <WH1657>.
And from <WH7097> among his brethren <WH251> he took <WH3947> five <WH2568> men <WH582>, and presented <WH3322> them unto <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> unto his brethren <WH251>, What is your occupation <WH4639>? And they said <WH559> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, Thy servants <WH5650> are shepherds <WH7462>, both we <WH1>, and our fathers.

And they said <WH559> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, To sojourn <WH1481> in the land <WH776> are we come <WH935>; for there is no pasture <WH4829> for thy servants <WH5650>' flocks <WH6629>; for the famine <WH7458> is sore <WH3515> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>: now therefore <WH5650>, we pray thee, let thy servants dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> spake <WH559> unto Joseph <WH3130>, saying <WH559>, Thy father <WH1> and thy brethren <WH251> are come unto thee <WH935>:

the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> is before thee <WH6440>; in the best <WH4315> of the land <WH776> make <WH3427> thy father <WH1> and thy brethren <WH251> to dwell <WH3427>; in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657> let them dwell <WH3427>: and if thou knowest <WH3045> any able <WH2428> men <WH582> among them <WH7760>, then make them rulers <WH8269> over my cattle <WH4735>.
And Joseph <WH3130> brought in <WH935> Jacob <WH3290> his father <WH1>, and set him <WH5975> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>: and Jacob <WH3290> blessed <WH1288> Pharaoh <WH6547>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> unto Jacob <WH3290>, How <WH4100> many are the days of the years of thy life <WH3117>?

And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, The days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of my pilgrimage <WH4033> are a hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>: few <WH4592> and evil <WH7451> have been the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of my life <WH2416>, and they have not attained <WH5381> unto the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of my fathers <WH1> in the days <WH3117> of their pilgrimage <WH4033>.
And Jacob <WH3290> blessed <WH1288> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and went out <WH3318> from the presence <WH6440> of Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And Joseph <WH3130> placed <WH3427> his father <WH1> and his brethren <WH251>, and gave <WH5414> them a possession <WH272> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the best <WH4315> of the land <WH776>, in the land <WH776> of Rameses <WH7486>, as Pharaoh <WH6547> had commanded <WH6680>.
And Joseph <WH3130> nourished <WH3557> his father <WH1>, and his brethren <WH251>, and all his father <WH1>'s household <WH1004>, with bread <WH3899>, according <WH6310> to their families <WH2945>.

And there was no bread <WH3899> in all the land <WH776>; for the famine <WH7458> was very <WH3966> sore <WH3515>, so that the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> and the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> fainted <WH3856> by reason <WH6440> of the famine <WH7458>.

And Joseph <WH3130> gathered up <WH3950> all the money <WH3701> that was found <WH4672> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, for the grain <WH7668> which they bought <WH7666>: and Joseph <WH3130> brought <WH935> the money <WH3701> into Pharaoh <WH6547>'s house <WH1004>.

And when the money <WH3701> was all spent <WH8552> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, all the Egyptians <WH4714> came <WH935> unto Joseph <WH3130>, and said <WH559>, Give <WH3051> us bread <WH3899>: for why should we die <WH4191> in thy presence <WH3701>? for our money faileth <WH656>.
And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559>, Give <WH3051> your cattle <WH4735>; and I will give <WH5414> you for your cattle <WH4735>, if money <WH3701> fail <WH656>.

And they brought <WH935> their cattle <WH4735> unto Joseph <WH3130>; and Joseph <WH3130> gave <WH5414> them bread <WH3899> in exchange for the horses <WH5483>, and for the flocks <WH6629>, and for the <WH4735> herds <WH1241>, and for the asses <WH2543>: and he fed <WH5095> them with bread <WH3899> in exchange for all their cattle <WH4735> for that year <WH8141>.

And when that year <WH8141> was ended <WH8552>, they came <WH935> unto him the second <WH8145> year <WH8141>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH3582>, We will not hide from my lord <WH113>, how that our money <WH3701> is all spent <WH8552>; and the herds <WH4735> of cattle <WH929> are my <WH413> lord <WH113>'s; there is nought left <WH7604> in the sight <WH6440> of my lord <WH113>, but our bodies <WH1472>, and our lands <WH127>:

wherefore should we die <WH4191> before thine eyes <WH5869>, both we and our land <WH127>? buy <WH7069> us and our land <WH127> for bread <WH3899>, and we and our land <WH127> will be servants <WH5650> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>: and give <WH5414> us seed <WH2233>, that we may live <WH2421>, and not die <WH4191>, and that the land <WH127> be not desolate <WH3456>.

So Joseph <WH3130> bought <WH7069> all the land <WH127> of Egypt <WH4714> for Pharaoh <WH6547>; for the Egyptians <WH4714> sold <WH4376> every man <WH376> his field <WH7704>, because the famine <WH7458> was sore <WH2388> upon them <WH776>: and the land became Pharaoh <WH6547>'s.
And as for the people <WH5971>, he removed <WH5674> them to the cities <WH5892> from one end <WH7097> of the border <WH1366> of Egypt <WH4714> even to the other end thereof <WH7097>.

Only the land <WH127> of the priests <WH3548> bought he <WH7069> not <WH3548>: for the priests had a portion <WH2706> from Pharaoh <WH6547>, and did eat <WH398> their portion <WH2706> which Pharaoh <WH6547> gave <WH5414> them <WH4376>; wherefore they sold not their land <WH127>.

Then Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Behold <WH7069>, I have bought you this day <WH3117> and your land <WH127> for Pharaoh <WH6547>: lo <WH1887>, here is seed <WH2233> for you <WH2232>, and ye shall sow the land <WH127>.

And it shall come to pass at the ingatherings <WH8393>, that ye shall give <WH5414> a fifth <WH2549> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and four <WH702> parts <WH3027> shall be your own <WH2233>, for seed of the field <WH7704>, and for your food <WH400>, and for them of your households <WH1004>, and for food <WH398> for your little ones <WH2945>.
And they said <WH559>, Thou hast saved our lives <WH2421>: let us find <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of my lord <WH113>, and we will be Pharaoh <WH6547>'s servants <WH5650>.

And Joseph <WH3130> made <WH7760> it a statute <WH2706> concerning the land <WH127> of Egypt <WH4714> unto this day <WH3117>, that Pharaoh <WH6547> should have the fifth <WH2569>; only the land <WH127> of the priests <WH3548> alone became not <WH7535> Pharaoh <WH6547>'s.

And Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>; and they gat them possessions <WH270> therein <WH6509>, and were fruitful, and multiplied <WH7235> exceedingly <WH3966>.

And Jacob <WH3290> lived <WH2421> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> seventeen <WH6240> years <WH8141>: so the days of Jacob <WH3290>, the years <WH8141> of his life <WH3967>, were a hundred forty <WH705> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.

And the time <WH3117> drew near <WH7126> that Israel <WH3478> must die <WH4191>: and he called <WH7121> his son <WH1121> Joseph <WH3130>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH4672>, If now I have found favor <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, put <WH7760>, I pray thee <WH3027>, thy hand under my thigh <WH3409>, and deal <WH6213> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with me <WH6912>: bury me not <WH4714>, I pray thee, in Egypt;

but when I sleep <WH7901> with my fathers <WH1>, thou shalt carry <WH5375> me out of Egypt <WH4714>, and bury <WH6912> me in their burying-place <WH6900>. And he said <WH559>, I will do <WH6213> as thou hast said <WH1697>.
And he said <WH559>, Swear <WH7650> unto me <WH7650>: and he sware unto him <WH3478>. And Israel bowed <WH7812> himself upon the bed <WH4296>'s head <WH7218>.
